column1: Just as soon as she could see out of her funny little gray eyes
column2: she began to try to get out of the box. She wanted to see what there was outside
column3: where Maltie went. She would climb up a little way
column4: and then tumble back on Miss Tittens and Cuddle
column7: and make Teddikins laugh; but Spitfire always said, Sptss!" and would try again.At last
column8: one day we heard a thump; and we looked around
column9: and there was Spitfire on the floor. She had climbed to the top of the box
column12: with her tail straight in the air
column16: "Sptss!"Maltie was very proud of her kitties
column17: and used to take Cuddle and Miss Tittens in her mouth
column18: and carry them into the dining-room when we were eating our breakfast
column19: to show them to us. But Spitfire would not let her mamma carry her.
